title: Product
description: A product in the catalog with variants and options.

id.description: Global ID (GID) uniquely identifying this product.

handle.description: URL-safe slug for SEO-friendly URLs (e.g., 'blue-runner-pro'). Use id for stable API references.

description.description: Product description in one or more formats. At least one format must be provided.

html.description: HTML-formatted description. Security: Platforms MUST sanitize before renderingâ€”strip scripts, event handlers, and untrusted elements. Treat all rich text as untrusted input.

category.description: Category: taxonomy path (e.g., 'Apparel > Shirts') or merchant-defined type (e.g., 'Premium Tee').

list_price.description: List price range before discounts (for strikethrough display).

media.description: Product media (images, videos, 3D models). First item is the featured media for listings.

variants.description: Purchasable variants of this product. First item is the featured variant for listings.

tags.description: Product tags for categorization and search.

metadata.description: Business-defined custom data extending the standard product model.
